mapper.select: select PLF001, PLF002, PLF004, PLF005, PLF006,t.info AAB301, f_getcodename('AAC004',PLF007) PLF007, PLF008, f_getcodename('AAC011',PLF009) PLF009, f_getcodename('AAA004',PLF010) PLF010, f_getcodename('AAA002',PLF011) PLF011, f_getcodename('AAA003',PLF012) PLF012, PLF013, f_getcodename('AAA001',PLF014) PLF014, AAE011, AAE036, PLF016, (case when plf.plf015 ='1' then '是' else '否' end) plf015, f_getcodename('AAA011',PLF017) PLF017, f_getcodename('AAA016',PLF018) PLF018, PLF019, PLF020, PLF021, PLF022, f_getcodename('EDC441',plf023) plf023, f_getcodename('PLF024',PLF024) PLF024, f_getcodename('PLF025',PLF025) PLF025,PLF026, DATASOURCE, AAE100,UPDATEDATE,UPDATEBY,CREATEBY,AAE012,ISOVERAGE,HELPYEAR from poor_labor_force plf ,POOR_XZQH t where plf.AAB301=t.XZQHBM and PLF002 = #{plf002,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and aae100='1'

select
from poor_labor_force
where plf005 = #{plf005} and aae100='1'

select count(1) from poor_labor_force plf left join poor_households ph on plf.plf002=ph.phd001 where plf.aae100='1'
and plf.AAB301 like #{poorLaborForce.aab301,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(1) from poor_labor_force where aae100='1' and plf025 ='0' and (plf010 in('1','2') or plf010 is null) and (plf018 in ('01','02') or plf018 is null) and plf008 >= 16 and plf008 <= 60 and plf002 = #{plf002}
select count(1) from poor_labor_force plf where plf.aae100='1' AND (plf.plf010='1' or plf.plf010 ='2') and plf.plf008 >= 16 and plf.plf008 <= 60 and plf002=#{plf002}
select count(1) from poor_labor_force plf where plf.aae100='1' AND plf.plf011 in ('2','5','4') and plf.plf008 >= 16 and plf.plf008 <= 60 and plf002=#{plf002}

select LISTAGG(plf.plf004, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY plf.plf004) from poor_labor_force plf where plf.aae100='1' AND plf.plf011 in ('2','5','4') and plf.plf008 >= 16 and plf.plf008 <=60 and plf002 = #{plf002}

select LISTAGG(plf.plf004, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY plf.plf004) from poor_labor_force plf where plf.plf002 =#{plf002} and (plf.plf010 not in('1','2') or plf.plf010 is null) and plf.plf018 in ('01','02') and plf.plf008 >= 16 and plf.plf008 <= 60 and plf.plf001 not in (select plf.plf001 from poor_labor_force plf where plf.aae100 = '1' AND plf.plf011 in ('2', '5', '4')) and plf002 = #{plf002}

select plf005,plf001 from poor_labor_force where aae100='1' and plf005 in
#{plf005}
